member.name: T:Goedel.Test.Core.NamespaceDoc
member.summary: Various functions to support unit testing.

member.name: T:Goedel.Test.Core.TestSession
member.summary: Test session, a specialization of the serialized class in which the request and response messages are captured.

member.summary: Post a request and retrieve the response.
member.param: StreamBuffer object containing JSON encoded request.
member.returns: StreamBuffer object containing JSON encoded response.
